code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Container,Paper,Typography,TextField,Button,Box,Link as MuiLink}from'@mui/material';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../contexts/AuthContext';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const{login}=useAuth();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await login(email,password);toast.success('Login successful!');navigate('/pets');}catch(error){toast.error(error.message||'Failed to login');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{maxWidth:"sm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{sx:{p:4,mt:4},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",component:"h1",gutterBottom:true,align:"center",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{component:"form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,sx:{mt:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Email",type:"email",fullWidth:true,margin:"normal",required:true,value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Password",type:"password",fullWidth:true,margin:"normal",required:true,value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",variant:"contained",color:"primary",fullWidth:true,sx:{mt:3},children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{mt:2,textAlign:'center'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{children:["Don't have an account?",' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MuiLink,{component:Link,to:"/auth/register",children:"Register here"})]})})]})});};export default Login;
